original: 介紹《三國群英傳8》的基本遊戲流程及內政系統。包含「太守派任」、「幕僚派任」、「建設」、「尋索武將」、「武將招募」、「裝備配置」等功能。
text: Introduce the basic game process and internal affairs system of "Three Kingdoms Heroes 8". Contains functions such as "prefect assignment", "appointment of staff", "building", "search for generals", "recruitment of generals", and "equipment configuration".
